title: Chris Padgett - Slaying Giants: Preparing for Greatness
description:
Chris Padgett - Slaying Giants: Preparing for Greatness [audio presentation]

Chris Padgett is a successful singer and songwriter, a sought-after speaker at diocesan events around the country, a published author and a passionate scholar. In this exciting talk, Chris shows how each of us are called to change the world, to defeat giants, and to run the race in a manner so that weâ€™ll win. His words will inspire you not to let fear paralyze your heart, because you are not in this alone.
